abstract: Citigroup has been cutting jobs and selling business units in an effort to weather the financial storm. Now, its austerity measures appear to have claimed another victim: an annual holiday toy-train exhibit in its lobby in New York.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup has been cutting jobs and selling business units in an effort to weather the financial storm. Now, its austerity measures appear to have claimed another victim: an annual holiday toy-train exhibit in its lobby in New York.

headline.main: Citi’s Cost Cuts Derail a Model-Train Tradition
